name: battle-backend
description: Battle tennis tournament platform - Backend API

scripts.db:reset: npm run db:clear-sessions && prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.db:clear-sessions: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dir = './sessions'; if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { fs.readdirSync(dir).forEach(f => fs.unlinkSync(path.join(dir, f))); console.log('Sessions cleared'); } else { console.log('No sessions directory'); }"

author: Battle Team
